content.text: Rory Flenderson is Toby Flenderson's brother. He is played by Warren Lieberstein, Paul Lieberstein's real-life brother. Rory lives in Boulder, CO.

In Goodbye, Michael, during their last interaction, Toby happily tells Michael to look up Rory in Boulder once he's settled in. Michael is visibly horrified about learning of this but simply replies "OK" and then walks away.

Toby is later seen talking to Rory via Skype and tells him that Michael is coming and tells Rory that he and Michael will "hit it off" in some way. Rory seems to be pleased that Michael is coming and offers to make a gift basket for Michael.
